typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Trade_ID as string,
		SECURITY_TYP as string,
		Strategy as string,
		Broker as string,
		Ticker as string,
		ID_BB_UNIQUE as string,
		ID_BB_GLOBAL as string,
		Date as date 'mm/dd/yyyy',
		buy_sell as string,
		Quantity as integer '##0',
		Price as double '000,000,000.000',
		Notional as string,
		Comments as string,
		{Uploaded Time} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TbAccessTrades
TbAccessTrades sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[''],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> tbTradesChange
